name: Gear Up (itch)
description:
How to play:

Up and down to select options

Press enter to display more info and confirm

Forges are shops with a funky name (Forge means buy, transmute means sell)

Beat floor 10 to win

Battle is decided through random chance (chance to win is displayed on the right hand side below the enemy graphic)

Chance to win and flee is affected by power values of the enemy and the player

FAQ

Q: HELP THE WINDOW/THE SCREEN IS DISTORTED

A: Right click the window, click on properties, go to the layout tab and change the height to 300 and the width to 160
